name: Plebdev
headerTaglineThree: developer / educator / hacker / founder of plebdevs

projects.title: Igloo Desktop
projects.description: Desktop signer and key management app for FROSTR. Igloo provides secure distributed key management using threshold signatures, allowing users to split their Nostr private keys into shares that can be stored across multiple devices for enhanced security and backup.

projects.title: Frostr
projects.description: Solving Nostr's key management problem. Frostr provides password reset and key recovery functionality for Nostr utilizing the powers of FROST - making the protocol far more secure, accessible, and user-friendly.

projects.title: Igloo Server
projects.description: Lightweight self-hostable Frostr server & signing client with NIP46 support. Supports headless mode with .env config or full-featured database mode with SQLite and user management.

projects.title: Igloo Web
projects.description: Browser-first FROSTR signer built with React/Vite. Runs entirely in-browser with encrypted shares stored in localStorage for secure key management without server dependencies.

projects.title: Igloo Core
projects.description: TypeScript library providing essential functionality for FROSTR/Bifrost distributed key management and remote signing. Strongly-typed API for building secure distributed signing applications.

projects.title: Igloo CLI
projects.description: Command-line interface for FROSTR functionality including key operations, signing, peering, and recovery processes. Ideal for developers and power users.

projects.title: PlebDevs Platform
projects.description: Content and community platform built on Nostr and fully Lightning integrated. Offers comprehensive learning resources, community features, and subscription-based premium content using Bitcoin's Lightning Network.

projects.title: Voltage
projects.description: Voltage is a Bitcoin & Lightning infrastructure platform that makes it easy to deploy and manage Bitcoin and Lightning nodes in the cloud, all non-custodial.

projects.title: BitcoinLink
projects.description: Create single-use non-custodial Bitcoin links redeemable via Lightning using Nostr Wallet Connect.

projects.title: MakePrisms
projects.description: Worked on Lightning / Nostr integrated payments API and multiple full-stack apps that utilize the API.

projects.title: Stacker News
projects.description: Stacker News, the front page of Bitcoin. I worked on the frontend and backend of the project. I implemented features like Bounties and Nostr crossposting.

projects.title: Fold App
projects.description: Earn Bitcoin back on everything. Buy Bitcoin with no fees. I worked on the frontend app. Deployed multiple features and bug fixes to both iOS and Android.

projects.title: Plebdevs Course 2 - Building a Lightning Wallet Backend
projects.description: Learn backend development from scratch and build a simple Lightning wallet backend with a server, API, database, and Lightning node using Node.js.

projects.title: Plebdevs Course 1 - Building a Lightning Wallet Frontend
projects.description: Write your first code and learn frontend development from scratch to build a simple Lightning wallet using HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and React.

projects.title: Plebdevs Community
projects.description: PlebDevs is a Bitcoin/Lightning App developer community focused on education, collaboration, and building hard skills.

projects.title: QuickCashu
projects.description: A Lightning / Cashu Ecash wallet designed for fast easy onboarding and use with features like Lightning Address, Nostr Wallet Connect, Nostr Wallet Auth, and prism payments.

projects.title: Pulsar
projects.description: Pulsar is an encrypted Nostr chat app that masks your metadata. It works by sending fixed-length, fixed-frequency messages over the Nostr messaging network. I worked with supertestnet on this project, we submitted it for HRF's encrypted group chat bounty.

projects.title: Forethought AI
projects.description: Implemented AI products for startups and enterprises. Worked on multiple projects that utilized AI and Machine Learning. Built custom models / datasets / pipelines for clients.

projects.title: Ln-Inbound
projects.description: An easy to deploy LND wrapper to sell inbound Lightning channels from your own node. Me and @cmdruid built this for the Bitcoin++ hackathon.

projects.title: Devstr
projects.description: Devstr is a prototype GitHub-like platform that uses Nostr for storing and broadcasting redundant repository data. Me and @btcretriever built this for the 2023 Austin SatsX hackathon and won the prize for the Nostr category.

projects.title: pleb-post
projects.description: A full-stack Lightning template app for learning and building your first Lightning app. Built with Next.js, LNBits, and Voltage.cloud. This project was built as a part of my presentation 'Building your First Lightning App' at the Bitcoin++ conference.

projects.title: pleb-node
projects.description: A simple full-stack Lightning app template for learning and development with LND.

projects.title: Alby
projects.description: Contributed feature that allows users to tip on Reddit and recognize lightning addresses on Reddit user descriptions as well as extending the LUD-18 payer data capabilities for the wallet/extension.

projects.title: Sats4Tips
projects.description: Your own personalized space for collecting tips in Bitcoin. I helped build out the frontend and styles with my team at the Bitcoin++ hackathon.

projects.title: Bloomtech
projects.description: Bloomtech is a full stack developer bootcamp that teaches the latest in web development. I worked as a Team Lead walking students through the full curriculum, helping them with their projects, blockers, and leading workshops / 1:1's.

projects.title: Bitcoin Knowledge Bot
projects.description: The first EVER custom trained and fine-tuned Bitcoin knowledge LLM. Bitcoin Knowledge Bot is powered by GPT-3 and trained on an open source dataset of established Bitcoin knowledge.

projects.title: Reclaim
projects.description: Reclaim is an open source desktop app for collecting and storing your online information. With Reclaim you can collect your social media data in a few clicks and explore every photo, friend, and interaction from your digital life.

projects.title: FB-Explorer
projects.description: fbexplorer is a tool that lets you reclaim, search, and explore all of your Facebook data. This is a single page application built with React and utilizing Redux/hooks for state management. fbexplorer does not collect any user's Facebook data or personal information.

projects.title: Austin's Game of Life
projects.description: An implementation of Conway's Game of Life. This is a React single page application with a random cell placement feature, speed settings for the simulation, and the ability to step through each generation with a visual counter.

projects.title: snstr
projects.description: Secure, lightweight TypeScript library for Nostr. Supports 18 NIPs including NIP-04/44 encryption, NIP-46 remote signing, NIP-47 wallet connect, and NIP-57 zaps. Works on Node.js, browsers, and React Native.

projects.title: nostr-mcp-server
projects.description: MCP server enabling AI models like Claude to interact with Nostr. Provides 17 tools for reading profiles, publishing notes, managing zaps, and identity operations. Built with snstr.

media.title: Frostr Workshop - Bitcoin 2025 Vegas
media.description: Austin & Topher's FROSTR workshop. Walking through the basics of the protocol and going through a live demo with the audience (signing a 6/12 Nostr multisig note live!)

media.title: No Password Reset? How Frostr Saves Your Nostr Identity
media.description: Born out of a hackathon at TABCONF 2024, Frostr may have just solved Nostr's most pernicious issue: the inability to reset your password if your private key gets compromised.

media.title: Frostr Explained - Thank God For Nostr Podcast
media.description: A deep dive into FROSTR with myself and @cmd discussing how we're solving key recovery in the Nostr ecosystem and the technical challenges involved.

media.title: NOSTR is a MASSIVE Paradigm Shift! - Pleb Underground
media.description: In-depth interview about PlebDevs platform and Frostr, discussing the paradigm shift that Nostr represents and the future of decentralized communication.

media.title: Frostr.org: Solving Nostr's Biggest Problem
media.description: Featured on Bitcoin Magazine's Space discussing Frostr, a project addressing critical challenges in the Nostr ecosystem. Speaking alongside JuanGalt and Topher.

media.title: PlebDevs Platform Launch
media.description: Live platform launch and presentation at the Bitcoin Commons in Austin, Texas. Introducing the Nostr-based education and community platform for Bitcoin developers.

media.title: EDAS (Enterprise Digital Asset Summit)
media.description: From EDAS, delivering talk: The Power of Lightning

media.title: BitBlockBoom
media.description: From BitBlockBoom Workshop Day 2024 - 'Building Your First Lightning App'

media.title: Startup Day
media.description: From Pleblab Startup Day 2023 - 'Inspiring Developers and Builders of Tomorrow'

media.title: Bitcoin++
media.description: From Bitcoin++ Workshop Day - 'Building Your First Lightning App'

media.title: San Antonio Bitcoin Meetup
media.description: Pleb Say #11 Fireside Chat with Austin & Jana

media.title: Bitcoin Park - Grassroots Bitcoin 2022
media.description: Grassroots Bitcoin 2022 - Building a Bitcoin City w Austin, Tristan, Kyle, and Car

media.title: Bitcoin Rapid Fire w John Vallis
media.description: The Journey to Becoming a Bitcoin Developer w/ Austin Kelsay

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: Frontend to backend, mobile to webâ€”I ship production code. React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, React Native. Startup MVPs, enterprise systems, everything in between.

services.title: Bitcoin & Lightning
services.description: 4+ years deep in the Bitcoin stack. Lightning wallets, payment APIs, node infrastructureâ€”I've built it all. Now leading enterprise implementations at Voltage, bringing Bitcoin to businesses.

services.title: Nostr Development
services.description: In the Nostr ecosystem since the early days. Shipped clients, platforms, and libraries like snstr. Zaps, NWC, NIP-46, remote signingâ€”I know the protocol inside and out.

services.title: Protocol & Cryptography
services.description: Co-created Frostrâ€”FROST threshold signatures for Nostr key recovery. I enjoy the deep end: cryptographic primitives, distributed systems, protocol-level engineering.

services.title: Developer Education
services.description: 3+ years teaching devs to build on Bitcoin, Lightning, and Nostr. 1,000+ paid students, dozens of conference workshops, daily community support through Plebdevs. I make hard tech click.

services.title: Enterprise Implementation
services.description: Head of Implementation at Voltage. I help companies integrate Bitcoin and Lightningâ€”from technical architecture to proof-of-concepts to production. Bridging bleeding-edge tech with business reality.

aboutpara:
I started my programming journey self-taught, driven by a passion and curiosity for Bitcoin and a desire to build applications that leverage the technology.

I joined Lambda School (now Bloomtech) Full Stack Developer Bootcamp in 2018. After graduating, I stayed on as a Team Lead, guiding students through the full curriculum. That's when I discovered my love for teaching and developer education.

I moved to Austin, TX to accelerate my journey into Bitcoin development. I joined PlebLab, where I launched Plebdevsâ€”a Bitcoin app developer education platform.

Throughout my career, I've worked for multiple companies and startups as a developer, spanning traditional web development, backend APIs, mobile apps, Bitcoin / Lightning / Nostr, and AI.

I'm passionate about building and teachingâ€”always looking for new opportunities to do both.

resume.description: I started my programming journey self-taught, driven by a passion and curiosity for Bitcoin and a desire to build applications that leverage the technology. I joined Lambda School (now Bloomtech) Full Stack Developer Bootcamp in 2018. After graduating, I stayed on as a Team Lead, guiding students through the full curriculum. That's when I discovered my love for teaching and developer education. I moved to Austin, TX to accelerate my journey into Bitcoin development. I joined PlebLab, where I launched Plebdevsâ€”a Bitcoin app developer education platform. Throughout my career, I've worked for multiple companies and startups as a developer, spanning traditional web development, backend APIs, mobile apps, Bitcoin/Lightning/Nostr, and AI. I'm passionate about building and teachingâ€”always looking for new opportunities to do both.

careerExperiences.type: Developer Relations Engineer â†’ Head of Implementation
careerExperiences.bullets: Started as Developer Relations Engineer, creating developer education content, documentation, and examples to make Lightning development more accessible. Represented Voltage at industry conferences and events to foster adoption of Lightning technology. Promoted to Head of Implementation after six months, now leading enterprise solutionsâ€”designing and implementing custom Lightning integrations for clients, helping them navigate technical requirements and integrate Bitcoin payments into their existing systems. Provide technical sales support by creating proof-of-concepts, demonstrating integrations, and solving complex implementation challenges.

Started as an open source contributor and transitioned into contract work. Built the Stacker News bounties feature. Built Stacker News Nostr crossposting. Contributed to the Stacker News development Docker environment.

Built multiple example apps implementing non-custodial zaps with NWC. Developed a Lightning/NWC-based payments API. Built Telegram and Discord Lightning zap bots. Created QuickCashu, a non-custodial Lightning/Cashu wallet.

Developed the Fold App frontend using React Native, deploying to iOS and Android. Worked on internal projects including an analytics pipeline for marketing, BIP-21 unified QRs for Bitcoin, and a prototype for Lightning withdrawals and rewards. Represented the company at multiple conferences and Bitcoin events.

personalExperiences.bullets: Co-created Frostr, a key recovery solution for Nostr that solves one of the protocol's biggest usability challenges. Launched at TABCONF 2024 hackathon, earning recognition including a Bitcoin Magazine feature. Implemented FROST (Flexible Round-Optimized Schnorr Threshold signatures) for secure distributed key management.

Launched the Plebdevs platform (plebdevs.com) in 2024, a Nostr-based content and community hub with Lightning integration. Founded Plebdevs as a Bitcoin/Lightning developer community focused on education, collaboration, and building hard skills. Created two beginner developer courses with 1,000+ paid students. Developed and published dozens of beginner technical workshops on YouTube and Twitch. Manage the Plebdevs community and content across Discord, Twitch, YouTube, and Nostr. Work with students 1:1 to help them reach technical and career goals. Created and presented workshops at TABconf, Bitcoin++, BitBlockBoom, and beyond.
